HomePage.about: At STAY FIT, we are dedicated to providing personalized fitness coaching sessions that empower our clients to achieve their health and wellness goals. Our experienced coaches understand that every individual is unique, and we tailor our programs to meet the specific needs of each client, ensuring a supportive and effective fitness journey. Join us to experience a holistic approach to fitness that combines expert guidance with a community of like-minded individuals.
HomePage.GeneralFitnessDescription: Do you find yourself quickly tiring when climbing stairs? Don't worry! We offer a fitness program specifically designed for your age and weight, using circuit training and an endurance approach to help you regain your fitness and energy.
HomePage.ExercisesDescription: Ready to welcome your new baby or have you recently given birth? If you're suffering from muscle slackness or the effects of a C-section, we're here to help! With our expert trainers, we'll help you achieve the desired fitness by treating muscle separation and tightening your abdominal muscles.
HomePage.BoxingDescription: Learn or perfect your boxing technique with our high-quality equipment and experienced instructors.
HomePage.YogaDescription: Complete combat training combining standing fighting, wrestling and ground combat techniques.

FAQ.faqdescription: We are here to help you with any questions you may have. If you don't find what you need, please contact us at
FAQ.question1: How do I book a session with a coach on StayFit?
FAQ.answer1: To book a session with one of our professional coaches:
FAQ.answer11: 1. Purchase a session pack from our membership options.
FAQ.answer12: 2. Navigate to the Book Session area in your profile.
FAQ.answer13: 3. Choose an available coach based on your requirements.
FAQ.answer14: 4. Select your preferred date, time, and location from the available options.
FAQ.answer16: Once confirmed, You can view all your upcoming sessions in the 'Upcoming Sessions' section of your profile.
FAQ.question2: Can I cancel or reschedule my reserved session with a coach?
FAQ.answer2: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your reserved session with a coach. To do so, navigate to the Book Session area in your profile and select the session you wish to cancel or reschedule. You can also contact our support team to assist you.
FAQ.question3: How can I find coaches who specialize in specific areas like cardio or boxing?
FAQ.answer3: To find coaches who specialize in specific areas like cardio or boxing, you can use the search functionality on our coaches page. You can search by coach name or by the area of expertise.
FAQ.question4: What fitness levels are accommodated in your various training sessions?
FAQ.answer4: Our training sessions accommodate all fitness levels, from beginners to advanced athletes. Each coach session like in , cardio, boxing, swimming, and kids' sessions offers tiered programming designed to match your current abilities while providing appropriate challenges for growth. Our coaches will assess your fitness level during your first session and tailor the training accordingly. As you progress, your coach will adjust the intensity and complexity of exercises to ensure you continue to improve and reach your fitness goals safely and effectively.

Hero.title: Unlock Your Potential
Hero.description: Join expert coaching designed to elevate your skills and transform your life. Your first session is completely FREE â start your journey today!

AboutUs.headerdescription: Your Journey with Mobile Training: Our Vision, Mission, and the Team Driving Your Transformation
AboutUs.title: Who We Are
AboutUs.description: We are the first Saudi app that offers you the experience of mobile personal training, providing you with professional trainers who come to you wherever you are, at a time that suits you.
AboutUs.visionDescription: We strive to be the first choice in the field of personal training in the Kingdom by offering innovative and personalized services that meet our clients needs and enhance their quality of life.
AboutUs.missionDescription: We aim to empower individuals to achieve their health and fitness goals in a comfortable and safe environment, becoming your partner in the journey to becoming the best version of yourself. We are here to inspire and support you every step of the way toward improvement and growth.

TermsAndConditions.pageSubtitle: Please read the following terms and conditions carefully.

ptSwimmingSection.title: Terms and Conditions for Personal Training and Swimming Personal Training Program (Men & Women)
ptSwimmingSection.attendancePoint1: The member must sign attendance for each training session at its scheduled time.
ptSwimmingSection.attendancePoint2: Signing for any completed training session cannot be postponed, and attendance must be confirmed via the website.
ptSwimmingSection.completionDesc: All training sessions must be completed before the expiration of the contract period specified according to the following:
ptSwimmingSection.contractPoint1: A new contract must be signed for each training package.
ptSwimmingSection.contractPoint2: The maximum limit for each contract is 50 training sessions.
ptSwimmingSection.notesPoint1: It is recommended to adhere to the scheduled times to ensure full benefit from the program.
ptSwimmingSection.notesPoint2: If you have any questions, please contact us.
ptSwimmingSection.notesPoint3: Stay Fit cannot provide female trainers for male members.

generalPtSection.title: General Terms and Conditions for Personal Training Program
generalPtSection.point1Desc: "Stay Fit" reserves the right to provide a substitute trainer if the original trainer is unavailable for any reason. The member has no right to object or claim any compensation.
generalPtSection.point2Desc: If the member wishes to cancel any training session, they must inform the responsible trainer or the sports manager at the center at least 12 hours before the scheduled session time.
generalPtSection.point3Desc: Fees paid by the member to "Stay Fit" for the requested training sessions are non-refundable, and the member has no right to object or claim compensation.
generalPtSection.point4Desc: The duration of each training session is 60 minutes, unless specified otherwise. The member has no right to request an extension of the session for any reason.
generalPtSection.point5Desc: By signing this contract, the member agrees to comply with all regulations and policies of "Stay Fit", which may be amended without the need for written notice to the member.
generalPtSection.point6Desc: The member must adhere to the scheduled times for training sessions. "Stay Fit" bears no responsibility for the member's delay in attending any session or failing to cancel according to the terms.

declarationsSection.title: Member Declarations and Undertakings
declarationsSection.point1: The member declares they are in good health and there is no health reason preventing them from participating in sports activities.
declarationsSection.point2: The member declares they have not received any medical advice regarding their health condition before signing the contract.
declarationsSection.point3: The member undertakes to consult with their physician about their health condition before using the training program services.
declarationsSection.point4: If "Stay Fit" discovers any incorrect information provided by the member, it reserves the right to cancel the contract and demand payment of all outstanding amounts from the member.
declarationsSection.point5: The member acknowledges they have read and understood the terms and conditions of this contract and agrees to abide by them without objection.

freezeSection.title: Package Freezing
freezeSection.intro: We understand that there may be times when you need to temporarily pause your package due to unexpected circumstances such as illness, injury, or travel.
freezeSection.condition1: The package can be suspended for reasons specific to the client without proof for a period of two weeks (14 days).
freezeSection.condition2: If there is a document proving the validity of the suspension (such as a medical report or travel ticket), Stay Fit respects and appreciates this and agrees to the freeze according to the document for the duration mentioned therein.
freezeSection.condition3Desc: The freeze period cannot be extended or divided into multiple periods after it has been granted.
freezeSection.howtoTitle: How to Apply for Package Freezing :
freezeSection.howtoDescPart1: To freeze your package, please email us via your registered email address at:
freezeSection.howtoDescPart2: . You must provide us with the following information:
freezeSection.howtoPoint1: The reason you wish to freeze your account.
freezeSection.howtoPoint2: Proof of the stated reason (e.g., flight ticket, medical report, etc.), if the requested period exceeds two weeks or if requested.
freezeSection.confirmationDesc: Customer service will contact you within two working days to confirm whether the freeze request has been approved.
freezeSection.reactivationDesc: Your package will be automatically reactivated after the specified freeze period ends.
freezeSection.notesFreezePoint1: During the freeze period, you will not be able to use the temporarily suspended package.
freezeSection.notesFreezePoint2: If your trainer is traveling during your subscription period, you will have two options :
freezeSection.notesFreezeOption1: Freeze your subscription until their return.
freezeSection.notesFreezeOption2: Continue training using your active package with a substitute trainer.

TermsAndConditions.finalConfirmation: By signing the contract or using our services, you confirm that you have read and understood all the terms and conditions mentioned above, and you agree to abide by them.
